section.p: The installation of the Metrics Agent includes its initial configuration. To prepare the environment for application operators, you have to reconfigure the agent. It is necessary to explicitly activate the libvirt metrics that the application operators use for monitoring.
To reconfigure the agent, proceed as follows:

li.p: Activate the libvirt metrics. For details, refer to . For an example configuration, refer to the information on libvirt.yml in .
